channel.title: [PI]OverloadX 317[NEW FEATURES/FIXED]
channel.description:
[img]http://i1132.photobucket.com/albums/m565/I_Love_Santa/bannerlolcopy.png[/img] Hi guys this is the OverloadX 317 previous posted by James. Pictures Thread By James: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,471497.msg3448455.html#msg3448455 [b][u]New Features Added By I Love Santa [/u][/b] - Added New Staff Crowns - Fixed Mysql Problem - Fixed data.cfg/prices Problem - Fixed the memory leak - Added Turmoil - Moved Staff Zone - Moved Skill Area - Added Vesta, Statius, and Morrigan's - Added Bonuses to customs (i.e. Pkers Cape, Donator Cape, Admin Cape, and Mod Cape) - Fixed Dupes, ranks in yell, and player rights Source+Client Link(package): *snip* Credits To: Sanity, Alex, Ashton, Chris, And Me. Run Client Fix For Windows 7
@echo off title Client color 0a "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java" -Xmx300m -cp . Jframe 10 0 highmem members 32 pause
Run Server Fix For Windows 7
@echo off title OverloadX java -Xmx512m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server pause

item.title: [PI]OverloadX 317[NEW FEATURES/FIXED]
item.dc:creator: @I_Love_Santa I Love Santa
item.description:
@I_Love_Santa wrote:

[quote=“Sokolkiing, post:1, topic:396331”]
Hi guys this is the OverloadX 317 previous posted by James.

Pictures Thread By James:

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

New Features Added By I Love Santa

  • Added New Staff Crowns
  • Fixed Mysql Problem
  • Fixed data.cfg/prices Problem
  • Fixed the memory leak
  • Added Turmoil
  • Moved Staff Zone
  • Moved Skill Area
  • Added Vesta, Statius, and Morrigan’s
  • Added Bonuses to customs (i.e. Pkers Cape, Donator Cape, Admin Cape, and Mod Cape)
  • Fixed Dupes, ranks in yell, and player rights
    Source+Client Link(package): http://uppit.com/s06ooar9truh/OverloadX_317.rar
    Credits To: Sanity, Alex, Ashton, Chris, And Me.
    Run Client Fix For Windows 7

[quote]@echo off
title Client
color 0a
“C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java” -Xmx300m -cp . Jframe 10 0 highmem members 32
pause[/quote]
Run Server Fix For Windows 7[quote]@echo off
title OverloadX
java -Xmx512m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server
pause[/quote][/quote]
Ha you stole this from me on RL. Nice job with copy+paste

New Features Added By [b]I Love Santa[/b]

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Collin2234 Collin2234
item.description:
@Collin2234 wrote:

[quote=“Sokolkiing, post:40, topic:396331”][quote author=Collin2234 link=topic=493499.msg3617257#msg3617257 date=1307078392]

great source but how do i get the ::item command working…
and where is command.java… i cant find it sorry yes im a noob

Go to src/server/model/players/packets then you will see command.java and to get item working in command.java search “item” then put your name in the parenthesis
[/quote]
thx for helping the guy

hmm yeah iam back on moparscape was busy now in 1week but amback :)[/quote]
Welcome(:
